title: Flared sans, wacky "g"
content:
I just bought this just to figure out the font. One of the uh, weirder “g”s I’ve seen… Does anybody recognize it?  
Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924021453im_/http:/typophile.com/files/halbrahm_4927.jpg)
author: altaira

comments.content: He’s come to work with a bit of a hangover...

Hopefully it doesn’t _taste_ like that.

hhp

Sometimes [WhatTheFont](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924021453/http:/new.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/) is a great help:  
It’s [David-Farewell Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924021453/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/ingrimayne/david-farewell/?testdrive=custom%3D0%26seed%3D33%26dock%3D0%26size%3D105%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DHalbrahm%2520semigrassa%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%252Csingle) by [Robert Schenk](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924021453/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Robert%252BSchenk).  
F

Florian, how embarrassing. I usually do use WTF. Thanks.

I’ll go and be disgusted at this some more now… (Hrant, I hope!)
Unbelievable that this is Swiss design! :-)
Too many damned mountains in that small country!
